name: Custom Stock Balance Report
query:
SELECT 
    bin.item_code AS "Item Code:Link/Item:150",
    item.item_group AS "Item Group:Link/Item Group:150",
    bin.warehouse AS "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:150",
    SUM(bin.valuation_rate * bin.actual_qty) AS "Stock Value:Currency:120",
    SUM(bin.actual_qty) AS "Boxes:Float:100",
    IFNULL(sn_data.total_weight, 0) AS "Weights:Float:120",
    IFNULL(sn_data.total_length, 0) AS "Meters:Float:120"
FROM 
    `tabBin` bin
JOIN 
    `tabItem` item ON bin.item_code = item.name
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabBOM` bom ON bom.item = bin.item_code
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
        item_code,
        warehouse,
        SUM(custom_weight) AS total_weight,
        SUM(custom_length) AS total_length
    FROM 
        `tabSerial No`
    WHERE 
        status = 'Active'
    GROUP BY 
        item_code, warehouse
) sn_data ON sn_data.item_code = bin.item_code AND sn_data.warehouse = bin.warehouse
WHERE 
    item.item_group = 'Products' OR bom.item IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 
    bin.item_code, item.item_group, bin.warehouse, sn_data.total_weight, sn_data.total_length
ORDER BY 
    bin.item_code, bin.warehouse;
